page.title: 13TOURISM
page.content:
Tourism Blackhead See LOCAL HISTORY FOR CLIFF CASTLE MILL RUINS MINING AND WRECKS.
SeeLIFESTYLES FOR HEADLAND HOTEL AND DRAWBAR CLUB. The cornwall coastal path runs right round the cliffs. Small beaches can be reached by the adventurous from the coastal path or down private tracke from Ponsongath. There are spectacular sea views from the cliff path of the coast from Lowland Point to the Lizard. Chynhalls Farmhouse is still thatched as most Cornish cottages used to be and has a barn which used to be a Pilgrim Chapel. This farm is a Maritime mark.
